subject: New Uploads (audio evp's)
author: James W. Hyslope
full_text: I hope these stay up longer than a few hours.....I converted to MP3. My mistake on first time upload as they were in the longer .wav format (sounded best though...that's why was my original) They were DELETED. I should have read sticky ;)I hope these are helpful for others to hear what is out there. Very few have been enhanced (Audacity) so headphones are a MUST. You can find the EVP's in file name: Jim's RR-DR6o EVP's    ENJOY :)
